newsitem.title: USA: United Dental sees Q2 below estimates.
newsitem.headline: United Dental sees Q2 below estimates.

text.p: United Dental Care Inc said on Friday that its second quarter results are expected to be below analyst estimates and internal plans due to a substantial loss on a Medicaid contract in Arizona and high claims.
First Call listed the consensus second quarter earnings estimate at $0.33 a share.
The company had reported earnings of $0.23 a share in last year's second quarter on sales of $26.3 million.
The company is unable to determine how the company's second quarter results will fare and the company is reviewing appropriate accounting adjustments, including possible charges, United Dental said.
